content.content: 960×540 141 KB  Hi everyone, thanks for checking out the Weekly Relay! Whether you hold MKR or DAI, own a vault, or want to get more involved in governance, this is your one-stop shop for MakerDAO updates.  Current Events  This Week in Governance  Community Deep Dai-ve  Mark your Calendar  Useful Links  Have Feedback?   Current Events  Exploring NFTs as Collateral @monet-supply kicks off a discussion on the use of NFTs as collateral in the Maker Protocol. NFTs offer a large opportunity for collateralization, potentially in the tens of millions of Dai to start. The post includes projections based on various factors around risk and demand and offers several solutions to the onboarding and management of NFTs as collateral.  How Should MakerDAO Handle Junior Capital Providers? @Allan_Pedersen kicks off a discussion on how MakerDAO should handle Junior Capital providers in the context of Real-World Finance. As the post explains, junior positions involve more risk and are liquidated before senior positions, which means both parties have different interests when a loan goes bad and Junior’s capital is at stake. MakerDAO has expressed interest in maintaining senior positions in loans. The post outlines MakerDAO’s options and offers some pros and cons to start the discussion.  Dai Supply at All-Time High  Imgur882×191 58 KB  The Dai supply is currently sitting at an all-time high, inching closer to the 10 billion Dai milestone by the day. Annual profits are estimated at 113 million Dai, and the system surplus sits at 66 million Dai.   This Week in Governance  MIPs Weekly MIPs Update #70  1121×757 32.5 KB  The second week of ratification polls begins today!  — RFC and FS Dates for reference and existing proposals can be seen here. The Ratification polls for the January Governance Cycle are in their last voting week. Please, be sure to cast your vote before the week’s end!  Recent Executive Votes Recover DAI from Optimism Escrow, Changes to Uniswap LP Vault Debt Floor Parameters, Delegate Compensation - January 14, 2022 This executive proposal has passed, and the following changes occurred within the Maker Protocol:  Recover DAI from Optimism Escrow:  10 million DAI will be transferred to forum user @lost_some_dai. For further information, please see the initial Signal Request on the MakerDAO forum here.    Uniswap LP Vault Debt Floor (dust) Increases: The following Uniswap LP Vault Debt Floor (dust) changes were made to the Maker Protocol:     Vault Type Previous New Change     UNIV2DAIETH-A 15,000 DAI 60,000 DAI +45,000 DAI   UNIV2USDCETH-A 15,000 DAI 60,000 DAI +45,000 DAI   UNIV2WBTCDAI-A 15,000 DAI 60,000 DAI +45,000 DAI   UNIV2WBTCETH-A 15,000 DAI 25,000 DAI +10,000 DAI   UNIV2UNIETH-A 15,000 DAI 25,000 DAI +10,000 DAI     Delegate Compensation Payments - December: As per these successful governance polls (1, 2) and the ongoing trial of delegate compensation, a total of 48,290 DAI was distributed to seven recognized delegates as detailed below:     DAI Transferred Delegate     12,000 DAI FlipFlopFlap Delegate LLC   12,000 DAI schuppi   12,000 DAI Feedblack Loops LLC   8,597 DAI MakerMan   2,203 DAI ACREinvest   791 DAI JustinCase   699 DAI GFX Labs     Details on the breakdown of delegate compensation for December can be found on the MakerDAO forum here.    Active Governance Polls     Poll Name Vote Discussion     PPG - Open Market Committee Proposal Vote Discussion   Decrease the GUNIV3DAIUSDC2-A Liquidation Ratio Vote Discussion     Ratification Polls     Poll Name Vote Discussion     Collateral Offboarding Process (MIP62) Vote Discussion   Bug Bounty Program for MakerDAO Critical Infrastructure (MIP64) Vote Discussion   Maker Keeper Network (MIP63) Vote Discussion   Offboarding Content Production Core Unit Vote Discussion   Facilitator Onboarding for RWF-001 Vote Discussion   Onboarding Tech-Ops Core Unit (TECH-001) Vote Discussion   Onboarding Strategic Finance Core Unit (SF-001) Vote Discussion   Development & UX Core Unit Budget - DUX-001 Vote Discussion   Core Unit Budget, SNE-001 Vote Discussion   Modify Core Unit Budget, ORA-001 (Oracle Gas Costs) Vote Discussion   Modify Core Unit Budget - Sustainable Ecosystem Scaling (SES-001) Vote Discussion     Community Greenlight Polls     Collateral MIP9 Poll MIP6 Application     OGN (Origin Protocol) Ends 1/24 4PM UTC Application   OUSD (Origin Dollar) Ends 1/24 4PM UTC Application   RBLD (Robinland Holdings) Ends 1/24 4PM UTC Application   TUSD-PSM (TrueUSD) Ends 1/24 4PM UTC Application   USDap (BondAppetit) Ends 1/24 4PM UTC Application    Check out an ‘at-a-glance’ view of the current Vault types and their parameters on MakerBurn  Active Signal Requests Extend the Delegate Compensation Trial - Signal Request Ends January 31st - "The initial Signal Request that approved the Delegate Compensation Trial implemented a three-month trial period. During the trial period, we recognized that initial parameter requirements were too harsh and subsequently introduced the Performance Modifier to the trial via Signal Request, and this has been added to MIP61. As things stand, MIP61 has not been submitted for Formal Submission, as there are still a few changes being discussed. Consequently, January 2022 is the final month currently covered by the trial, and compensation for Recognized Delegates would cease after this month." In response to these events, @Patrick_J signals to the community by asking whether we should extend the Delegate Compensation Trial by a maximum of 6-months but end if MIP61 is approved. Worth reading to help in separating fact from fiction.    Multi-chain DAI-lights - 13 de Enero de 2022  Multi-Chain Dai-lights has come to the Latin American subforum!
